info.title: SongBanks API
info.description: Auto-generated API documentation using Swagpress framework

message.example: Invalid status. Must be either "active" or "suspend"

error.example: Your account status is inactive. Please contact administrator.

songs.description: Array of song IDs to include in the playlist

artist.description: Artist or composer of the song

lyrics_and_chords.example: Amazing grace how sweet the sound...

tag_names.description: Array of tag names. If a tag doesn't exist, it will be created automatically

name.description: Name of the tag to get or create

username.description: Username for admin or email for user

songs.description: Updated array of song IDs for the playlist

artist.description: Updated artist or composer of the song

base_chord.description: Updated base chord of the song

lyrics_and_chords.example: Amazing grace how sweet the sound...

tag_names.description: Updated array of tag names. If a tag doesn't exist, it will be created automatically

message.example: A playlist with this name already exists

hasPermission.description: Whether user has the required permission

user_id.description: ID of the user who owns the playlist

songs.description: Array of songs in the playlist

user_id.description: ID of the user who owns the playlist

songs_count.description: Number of songs in the playlist

hasNextPage.description: Whether there is a next page

hasPrevPage.description: Whether there is a previous page

lyrics_and_chords.example: Amazing grace how sweet the sound...

artist.description: Artist or composer of the song

lyrics_and_chords.example: Amazing grace how sweet the sound...

hasNextPage.description: Whether there is a next page

hasPrevPage.description: Whether there is a previous page

search.description: Search term used for filtering (null if no search applied)

get.description: Retrieve all unique artists from songs table

post.description: Authenticate admin (pengurus) with username/password or user (peserta) with email/password

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid credentials or insufficient access level

get.description: Check if current user has required role permission

get.summary: Get all notes by user (Vol_User Only)

post.description: Create a playlist for the authenticated user with optional songs

get.description: Retrieve all playlists for the authenticated user with pagination

put.description: Update playlist name and songs array for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a playlist by ID for the authenticated user

put.summary: Update member role in playlist team

get.summary: Get all songs with pagination, search, and filters
get.description: Retrieve all songs with support for pagination, full-text search across title/artist/lyrics, filtering by base chord and tags, and custom sorting

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for title, artist, or lyrics

get.description: Retrieve a single song with all associated tags by its ID

post.description: Create a new song with associated tags. Tags will be found by name or created automatically if they don't exist (Admin only)

put.description: Update an existing song and/or its associated tags. Tags will be found by name or created automatically if they don't exist. Include tag_names array to update tags, or omit to keep existing tags (Admin only)

delete.description: Delete a song and all its associations (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve all available tags with search support

post.description: Gets existing tag by name or creates a new one if it doesn't exist

get.summary: Get users with elevated privileges (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieves a paginated and searchable list of users with userlevel > 2 (requires admin authentication)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter by email or nama (case-insensitive partial match)

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions (user level must be > 2)
